thread.section_title: PromGirl Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PromGirl | www.promgirl.com | 9 of 523
thread.title: Paige

author: Paige
title: Paige
text: I called 2 times because I didn't know my dress size for a particular dress on the website and the lady I talked to told me I'm exactly a size 12 both times I called. I'm normally a size four or six and she insisted that I get a twelve and I did exactly what she said. I tried on the dress and it was extremely large. Not to mention it was expensive and it had been picked on the inside of the bust and there were stains on it. The lady was going to charge me a restocking fee to send it back however, we worked it out and in the end she said she would refund the money and send me a return label so I wouldn't have to pay the extra fees. Overall, the size chart is not correctly proportioned so if your going to order a dress from prom girl, order your normal size.
